True story. When I visited Alaska a park ranger gave me this advice for identifying the bears I might run into: If you climb a tree, and it climbs up too – it’s a Black Bear. if it shakes you out of the tree – it’s a Grizzly Bear. If there are no trees – it’s a Polar Bear. XD
